name: sharkkey
description: 🦈🔑 | averege encryption with a twist or two

scripts.build: .\node_modules\.bin\esbuild .\src\index.js --bundle --outdir=bundle --platform=node && pkg -t node16-win-x64  .\bundle\index.js --compress GZip -o dist/sharkkey-win-x64 && pkg -t node16-linux-x64  .\bundle\index.js --compress GZip  -o dist/sharkkey-linux-x64 && pkg -t node16-linux-arm64  .\bundle\index.js --compress GZip  -o dist/sharkkey-linux-arm64

author: Lunar
